page.title: SectorSatellites
page.t: Only activates when hostile l or xl ships are in range and warns the owner
Damages and disrupts engines of larger ships
Splits up into Survey Probes that detect hidden treasures, like datavaults and abandoned ships. One time use only.
SectorSatellite: Mod files were not found ingame, please make sure the mod is installed in the correct location \(/X4 Foundations/extensions\). Mod NOT activated!
A value wasn\'t correctly set to true or false, applying default values until fixed!
The lifetime has to be within 80 and 600 seconds, applying default values until fixed!
Survey Report - Object\(s\) of interest found in space:
Your %1 was destroyed in Sector: %2 by %3
Splits up into Survey Probes that detect hidden resources and place resource probes at the best spots
A similar probe like the standard resource probe. Was generated by a Resource Survey Unit.
A table value for $resourcesToScan is faulty, applying default values until fixed!
The mod setting %1 is faulty, applying default values until fixed!
Resource Survey Report - Resources found in
